attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As rape is an assault of a sexual nature,but none the less an assault on the person.
The nature of courts to assess the victims past sexual conduct is totally irrelevant to the procedings.
The courts do not question the victims of assualts in this way to determine if they have a past record of being physically assaulted previously.
It should now be understood and the conduct of questioning a rape victim as to previous sexual conduct is irrelevant and should not be allowed to determine if the victim deserved it or not.Alter the methods of court questioning now.

rejection.details:
There are severaal petitons already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/commonsense3/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
